title: The Vault: Part 3
description:
The officials tried to solve the vault problem. Their decision had major consequences for everyone in the arena – but no one more so than the frontrunner, Russia’s Svetlana Khorkina. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: The Vault: Part 3
itunes:author: Ari Saperstein
itunes:subtitle: The officials tried to solve the vault problem without stopping the competition, culminating in a heartbreaking conclusion.
